fields.title: transformation method
fields.pointers:
* Other ways of sampling from a 1-D distribution include:
**  [rejection sampling](rejection_sampling)
**  [slice sampling](slice_sampling) , an iterative method
** the polar coordinates trick for  [sampling from a Gaussian](sampling_gaussian)
fields.summary: The transformation method is a way of sampling from univariate probability distributions by sampling a uniform random variable and inverting the CDF.
